message:
Hi guys,
    As a side project I intend to download source codes from sites like github, bitbucket, codeplex, code.google, codeproject even code snippets from SOF, msdn and any well-known blog (Yes, I am intend to load a very big amount of codes) and then I will try to index them and try to learn something from them, and my question is
   What a machine can learn from parsing billions of code blocks, I already have some ideas but I need more
 Thank you

data.message:
- Best practice of the same idea ;)
- Creating a simple/complex app or something in between :D
- The layers or levels of projects( which code/update have to come first ) ;)
- Learn the difference between syntax of many languages and the ability of generating a code for a certain language ;)

- Detect similar code & abstract it in methods/classes/libraries
- See how many people copied code from SOF
- Find the funniest code comment
- Find the people who wrote the core engine of IE, find their home address, kidnap them & apply on them every technique in SAW movile
